title: Eve (Young novel)
text:
Eve is a 2015 <a href="Christian%20fiction">Christian fantasy</a> novel written by <a href="William%20P.%20Young">William P. Young</a>.
Plot.
A retelling of the <a href="Bible">biblical</a> <a href="fall%20of%20man">fall of man</a> told from a female perspective, the novel tells the story of Lilly Fields, the broken daughter of <a href="Eve">Eve</a>.
